item.description:
Ok... so you're back from a summer break. You've been playing online and missing some good local D&D action. You've been itching to find a game group where elves are respected and halflings don't take crap from nobody.

Well, if such a group exists, you're bound to find it or some like-minded searchers at the United D&D September Meetup.

Phoenix Landing is a local eating place and club near Pandemonium Books and Games in Cambridge. So why not come on out, meet some other cool D&D fans and let's get some games going!

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: United Dungeons & Dragons September Meetup Day
